resources.string:
Hello Protonite ! This is how I can help you : 
1. You can call anyone by using this command prefix : Call this Number 
2. You can search anything on Google by using this command prefix : Google this 
3. You can play any song/video on YouTube by using this command prefix : Play this 
4. You can send an SMS to anyone by using this command prefix : Ping 
5. You can take a Selfie by using this command : Take A Selfie 
6. You can take a Picture by using this command : Take A Picture 
7. You can turn FlashLight ON/OFF using this command : Turn ON/OFF FlashLight 
8. You can Increase/Decrease Brightness using this command : Increase/Decrease Brightness 
9. You can Set/Delete an Alarm using this command : Set/Delete An Alarm 
10. You can the Phone Settings using this command : Open Phone Settings 
11. You can view this Help List again by asking me to Help You 
You can also have short and simple conversations with me. 
Happy Protoning !
